document.full_text: with his sinker working, ivan nova allowed just two hits and a run in seven and a third innings, his deepest outing in 12 career starts.
document.title: yankees 4, rangers 1 : nova finds his pitch, leaving rangers helpless
lines_and_colors: with his sinker working, ivan nova allowed just two hits and a run in seven and a third innings, his deepest outing in 12 career starts.
